title: Calories in a Bag of Popcorn
meta_description: Discover calories in bag of popcorn, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for buttered microwave style.
h1: Calories in a Bag of Popcorn
assumptions: Standard microwave buttered popcorn bag, popped (approx. 100g), including oil/butter flavoring; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor (buttered vs. plain), bag size, and popping method. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard bag of buttered microwave popcorn contains about 440 calories and 50g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a bag of buttered popcorn?
faqs.a: Approximately 440 calories for a standard 100g popped microwave bag.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a bag of popcorn?
faqs.a: About 50g total carbs, including 10g fiber, for buttered microwave popcorn.

faqs.q: Are there calories in plain popcorn?
faqs.a: Plain air-popped popcorn has far fewer—around 140 kcal per 100g bag—mostly from carbs.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a bag of popcorn?
faqs.a: Buttered varieties often have 700mg or more due to seasoning; plain is lower.

faqs.q: Does bag size affect popcorn calories?
faqs.a: Yes—larger bags (e.g., 150g) can have 600+ kcal; always check serving size on the package.
